rule.condition: major.incident in $L.file=true and not (same(review.detail in $L.file, review.detail in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Major Incident in CurrentRecord = true AND Review Detail in CurrentRecord != Review Detail in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Major Incident">major.incident</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Detail">review.detail</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Detail">review.detail</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Major Incident in CurrentRecord = true AND Review Detail in CurrentRecord != Review Detail in SavedRecord))
